original_text: And when he was come into the ship, he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him.
korean_text: 예수께서 배에 오르실 때에 귀신 들렸던 사람이 함께 있기를 간구하였으나

sentences.original_text: And when he was come into the ship,
he that had been possessed with the devil
that he might be with him.
